title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Skills: Academic Writing Competency Enhancement Using Generative AI

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can reduce the time required to draft academic writing by 30% using generative AI tools.
Learners can evaluate information sources using a 3-step checklist to verify the credibility of AI-generated content.
Learners can recognize the limitations of AI in scientific academic writing (e.g., lack of contextual understanding) and develop compensatory strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
